name: VR Tightrope Walking :Wire Walking for VRCardboard
name_original: VR Tightrope Walking :Wire Walking for VRCardboard
description:
This is an amazing Virtual Reality game.
Tightrope walking is a incredible exciting game.
But now, we can play this game in our HOME..
With this app,You could experience Tightrope walking in VR headset.
Now, let's open our Eyes and make this adventure.
Try it now it's free.
